metadata.name: jrowny.brackets.snippets
metadata.title: Brackets Snippets
metadata.description: A simple brackets snippets extension.

metadata.title: DevDocs Viewer
metadata.description: Viewer for devdocs.io content

metadata.name: gruehle.markdown-preview
metadata.title: Markdown Preview
metadata.description: Live preview of markdown documents

metadata.name: select-parent
metadata.title: Select Parent
metadata.description: Lets you quickly select the parent block of the current selection using Cmd/Ctrl-<, and go back down using Cmd/Ctrl->.

metadata.name: test-quickly
metadata.title: TestQuickly
metadata.description: Launches the test runner (or re-runs tests) with a keypress

metadata.name: pflynn.brackets.editor.nav
metadata.title: File Navigation Shortcuts
metadata.description: (1) Go to next/previous editor in list order, instead of MRU – Ctrl+]/[, and (2) Quick Open filtered to just your open "Working Files" – Ctrl+Shift+E. (Shortcuts use Cmd on Mac).

metadata.name: pflynn.brackets.commands.guide
metadata.title: Brackets Commands Quick Search
metadata.description: Search and execute commands by typing part of their name, similar to Quicksilver (or Sublime's Ctrl+Shift+P 'Command Palette' or Eclipse's Ctrl+3). Press Ctrl+Alt+? (⌃⌘? on Mac) to launch.

metadata.name: pflynn.copy-as-html
metadata.title: Copy as HTML
metadata.description: Copy code to the clipboard with full color syntax highlighting preserved (assuming you're pasting into something that supports HTML-formatted text). To use, choose "Edit > Copy as Colored HTML".

metadata.name: pflynn.everyscrub
metadata.title: Everyscrub
metadata.description: Everything's a scrubber! Cmd/Ctrl + drag on any number or hex color to scrub its value and update the browser in real time, or use Shift+Alt+Up/Down to 'nudge' values with the keyboard.

metadata.name: pflynn.goto_last_edit
metadata.title: Goto Last Edit
metadata.description: Jump cursor to location of last edit in the current file by pressing Ctrl+*

metadata.name: pflynn.reasonable-comments
metadata.title: Reasonable Comments
metadata.description: Simple enhancement for typing block comments in Brackets: when you press Enter, the next line is automatically prefixed with a properly indented "*" (and a closing "*/" if needed).

metadata.name: pflynn.quick.import
metadata.title: Quick Require Import
metadata.description: Shortcut for generating RequireJS/CommonJS import statements (require() calls). Press Ctrl+I (⌘I on Mac) and type a filename to insert a require() line at the top of your file (in an existing block of imports if available).

metadata.name: pflynn.svg.preview
metadata.title: SVG Preview
metadata.description: Live preview SVG files in an inline panel while you edit them.

metadata.name: brackets-kill-ring
metadata.title: Brackets Kill Ring
metadata.description: Emacs-style kill ring extension for Brackets

metadata.name: brackets-simple-js-code-hints
metadata.title: Simple JS Code Hints
metadata.description: Brackets extension to that provides simple code hints for JavaScript. No type inference here, friends!

metadata.name: theseus
metadata.title: Theseus for Brackets
metadata.description: Retroactive debugging for JavaScript in Chrome and Node.js

metadata.name: brackets-indent-guides
metadata.title: Indent Guides
metadata.description: Show indent guides in the code editor.

metadata.name: brackets-lorem-ipsum

metadata.description:
Turns images into Data URI. Press Alt-Shift-G and put the URL in the box, that's it ! 
 From the project tree right click on an image and click 'Convert to data URI' and get it's dataURI

metadata.title: Brackets TypeScript

metadata.name: brackets-spec-rep
metadata.title: specRep - Special Character Replacer
metadata.description: Extension that searches through and replaces any special characters with relevant code equivalent.

metadata.name: camden.canalyzer
metadata.title: Canalyzer
metadata.description: Scans project for possible compatability issues.

metadata.name: vmalone.fileinfo-toclipboard
metadata.title: File Info to Clipboard
metadata.description: Copy name, path and directory path of a file to the clipboard.

metadata.name: julia
metadata.title: Julia Syntax Highlighter
metadata.description: Add syntax highlighting support for the Julia language (.jl).

metadata.name: mirc
metadata.title: mIRC Syntax Highlighter
metadata.description: Add syntax highlighting support for the mIRC language (.mrc).

metadata.name: lua
metadata.title: Lua Syntax Highlighter
metadata.description: Add syntax highlighting support for the Lua language (.lua).

metadata.name: http
metadata.title: HTTP Syntax Highlighter
metadata.description: Add syntax highlighting support for the HTTP language (.http).

metadata.name: simple-squarespace-templates-extension
metadata.title: Simple Squarespace Templates- Extension
metadata.description: A simple extension that adds HTML-markup and  html-highlight for *.block, *.region, *.conf, *.list, *.item files of Squarespace template

metadata.name: azakur4.azenc
metadata.title: Az - Encoding
metadata.description: convert files that cannot read Brackets to UTF-8 make the file readable to Brackets.

metadata.name: tommalbran.brackets-fonts-viewer
metadata.title: Font Viewer
metadata.description: Open font files in Brackets and see an editable sample of the font.

metadata.name: jade
metadata.title: Jade (Official Plugin)
metadata.description: Add first class support for jade (including syntax highlighting).  This module is maintained by the maintainer of jade.

metadata.name: brackets-legibility
metadata.title: Legibility
metadata.description: Increase the legibility of Brackets' UI. Useful for High DPI screens

metadata.name: pflynn.regex-editor
metadata.title: Inline Regex Editor
metadata.description: Inline regular expression editor for JavaScript code: enter test strings and see matches in real time as you edit the regexp - with full syntax highlighting and paren/brace matching. Mouseover capturing group matches to highlight the group within the regexp and the text within the test string.

metadata.name: cirru
metadata.title: Cirru Syntax
metadata.description: Syntax highlight package for Cirru grammar.

metadata.name: johnwu.brackets-code-connect
metadata.title: Brackets Code Connect
metadata.description: Realtime code sharing extension for brackets.

metadata.name: intellij.base-code
metadata.title: Insert Base Code
metadata.description: Inserts the 'base html code' into a file (much like DreamWeaver)

metadata.name: p4bl1t0.languageswitcher
metadata.title: Brackets Language Switcher
metadata.description: Allow to change the language mode for the editor. For example, to see Drupal inc files as PHP.

metadata.name: lens
metadata.title: Lens Syntax Highlighter
metadata.description: Add syntax highlighting support for the lens filetype (.lens).

metadata.name: chrisgriffith.jqmbrackets
metadata.title: jQuery Mobile
metadata.description: Code hinting for jQuery Mobile.

metadata.name: brackets-flake8
metadata.title: Python flake8 Lint
metadata.description: This extension enables the flake8 style guide checker for python code. Required pep8 (sudo pip install pep8).

metadata.name: brackets-nodejs
metadata.title: Node.js bindings
metadata.description: Execute node scripts and common npm commands inside Brackets.

metadata.name: kmacq.asciiart
metadata.title: ASCII Art generator
metadata.description: Use cool ASCII fonts to make your code more awesome

metadata.name: busykai.indent-right
metadata.title: Proper Indent
metadata.description: This extension will detect indentation used in your JavaScript files and will set it automatically

metadata.name: alexsalas.brackets-jekyll
metadata.title: Jekyll
metadata.description: An extension to build Github-Pages easy.

metadata.name: zeffii.precursor
metadata.title: Precursor
metadata.description: Precursor looks for recognized patterns on the current line and rewrites them to longform valid .js code

metadata.name: talmand.select-lines
metadata.title: Select Lines
metadata.description: Select lines by SHIFT-clicking in the gutter

metadata.name: brackets.swatcher
metadata.title: Swatcher
metadata.description: Load Photoshop ACO Palette Files (RGB only) or parse LESS @variables into the Bottombar for easier use.

metadata.name: le717.html-skeleton
metadata.title: HTML Skeleton
metadata.description: Automatically add the required HTML5 document tags to your document. Simply press Ctrl-Shift-N! Also includes tags for one external stylesheet and script.

metadata.name: brackets-main-window
metadata.title: MainWindow
metadata.description: Never lose track of the main window!

metadata.name: handlebars
metadata.title: Handlebars Syntax Highlighter
metadata.description: Add syntax highlighting support for the handlebars template language.

metadata.name: josecols.python-tidy
metadata.title: Python Tidy
metadata.description: Cleans up, regularizes, and reformats the text of Python scripts.

metadata.name: emailer.basetabledata
metadata.title: HTML Emailer basic table
metadata.description: Automatically create a basic table line that includes cellpadding='0' cellspacing='0' border='0' by using ctrl + shift + T

metadata.name: brackets-minify-more
metadata.title: Minify More
metadata.description: Compresses files using YUI for CSS and Closure Compiler for Js. Don't include single quotes (') inside a CSS comment. This is a fork from Alfred Xing Minifier.

metadata.name: brackets-console
metadata.title: Console
metadata.description: Shows console.log & console.error without developer tools.

metadata.name: tab-tags
metadata.title: Tab tags
metadata.description: Adds an Aptana-like tab when pressing ENTER after an opening HTML or XML tag.
